notFound.title: Whoops, the page you were looking for cannot be found
notFound.description: The link can be outdated or the page has been deleted.

unknownError.title: An error was detected!
unknownError.description: Try again later. If the situation recurs, tell us about it via our <2>feedback form</2>

apolloError.title: A connection problem was detected on the site!
apolloError.description: Some of the site's functions are unavailable. Try again later. If the problem persists, please let us know using the <2>feedback form</2>
